channel.title: News - Polish Regional News
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Regional News

item.title: Hungry 3-Year-Old Hospitalized in Zielona Góra
item.description: A malnourished 3-year-old girl was hospitalized in Zielona Góra due to severe hunger.

item.title: New Blues Record Set in Białystok
item.description: A new record for playing blues music non-stop has been achieved in Białystok, Poland.
